title: chad's Whiskey Sour (Difford's recipe)
recipe: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
ingredients: [['6 cl', 'Bourbon whiskey'], ['3 cl', 'Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)'], ['1.5 cl', 'Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)'], ['3 dash', 'Angostura or other aromatic bitters'], ['1.5 cl', 'Pasteurised egg white'], ['3 cl', 'Pineapple juice (fresh pressed)']]

title: Granny's
recipe: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.

title: Christmas Martini
recipe: STIR marmalade with gin in base of shaker until it dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
ingredients: [['1 spoon', 'Orange marmalade'], ['5 cl', 'Tanqueray Rangpur Gin'], ['1.5 cl', 'Cointreau triple sec liqueur'], ['1.5 cl', 'Becherovka liqueur'], ['1.5 cl', 'Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)']]

recipe: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

title: Blue coconut cloud
recipe: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake until the liquid is frothy. Strain in a boston glass and garnish with a cherry.
